title: What is the spiritual nature of humans?
description: Answer (1 of 6): The spiritual nature of not only humans but of all living entities is that of eternity, knowledge and bliss. The soul in all living entities is a minute particle of consciousness, and consciousness is by constitution spiritual. The world around us, including our bodies and minds...
